abstract: Mr. Miranda is set to play the role of Charley Kringas in the upcoming Encores! production of Stephen Sondheim’s “Merrily We Roll Along.”
snippet: Mr. Miranda is set to play the role of Charley Kringas in the upcoming Encores! production of Stephen Sondheim’s “Merrily We Roll Along.”

headline.main: Here's Charley: Lin-Manuel Miranda Signs on to 'Merrily We Roll Along'
